fields_of_interest: Education and training, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives: Copyright, internet (net neutrality, etc.), tackling fake news (our chair is a member of the HLEG on fake news and disinformation), children online protection, fighting extremism and hate language online.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: We are an official chapter of the Internet Society (based in Reston, VA, USA and Geneva, Switzerland)
goals__remit:
Promote the open, free and bottom-up development of the internet.  
Ensure that Bulgaria and other countries have Internet-friendly legislation.
relevant_communication: We maintain a facebook page with such information - https://www.facebook.com/groups/86264330996/
